category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CATIA_ci_catiaV4Part_is_modifiable
preference.preference_description: Create CATPart Dataset Under CATIA V4 Item Revision Require that an item revision of a CATIA V4 model must be checked out by the current user to allow creation of the CATPart dataset, by setting the following variable within Teamcenter Preferences to false. If the variable is set to true, it is not required that the item revision is checked-in or checked-out.
